channel.title: The CodeMeta Project
channel.description: Recent content on The CodeMeta Project

item.title: Crosswalk for DataCite metadata
item.description: Property DataCite programmingLanguage Format dateCreated Date (dateType=Created) dateModified DaTe (dateType=Issued) datePublished PublicationYear fileFormat Format license Rights publisher Publisher version Version description Description licenseId Rights relationships RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isPartOf), RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isVariantFormOf), RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isPreviousVersionOf), RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isNextVersionOf) "@id"; nameIdentifier

item.title: Crosswalk for GitHub metadata
item.description: Property GitHub programmingLanguage languages_url dateCreated created_at dateModified updated_at license license description description licenseId license issueTracker issues_url

item.title: Crosswalk for R Package DESCRIPTION file
item.description: The following table displays the crosswalk mapping of terms from the R package DESCRIPTION file to codemeta properties. Property R Package Description codeRepository URL author [aut] in Author contributor [ctb] in Author creator [cre] in Author datePublished Date license License description Description name Package url URL depends Depends, SystemRequirements suggests Suggests maintainer Maintainer licenseId License issueTracker BugReports givenName givenName familyName familyName email email

item.title: Crosswalk for Zenodo metadata
item.description: Zenodo.org is a data archive based at CERN which is popularly used to archive and provide DOIs to academic software from GitHub, as described in the official GitHub guide to Making your code citable. Property Zenodo codeRepository relatedLink applicationCategory communities datePublished date_published funder contributors.Funder keywords keywords license license description description/notes licenseId license "@id"; ORCID

item.title: Crosswalk for figshare metadata
item.description: Property Figshare codeRepository relatedLink applicationCategory categories datePublished date_retrieved keywords tags license License description Description licenseId License embargoDate embargo_date "@id"; ORCID name name
